summary: Diff implements several overlap-related layout adjustments (sticky header/root overflow control, responsive wrapping on Master Designs page, viewport-bounded Karigar List dialog scrolling) and adds mutual-exclusion state for OrdersFiltersBar calendar popovers. However, some acceptance criteria are not evidenced in the provided diffs (notably calendar popover clipping/z-index/close-on-select, and Master Designs row-level Actions menus/dialogs rendering above and not being clipped).

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the global layout so the navigation/sidebar (including the mobile left Sheet menu) never overlaps or obscures page content across routes and viewport sizes.
missing_requirements.reason: AppShell shows changes toward controlling overflow and header stacking (sticky header z-index and overflow-x-hidden), but the diff is truncated before showing how main content is positioned relative to the sticky header and the mobile Sheet overlay (e.g., content padding/offset, SheetContent sizing/scroll behavior). The evidence is insufficient to confirm that content never renders underneath the header/sheet across routes and viewport sizes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the date-picker (calendar) popovers so they do not overlap surrounding UI or each other, ensure only one calendar popover can remain open at a time, ensure popover is not clipped and closes after selection.
missing_requirements.reason: Mutual exclusivity state (fromDateOpen/toDateOpen and open-change handlers) is implemented, but the diff is truncated before showing (1) Popover/PopoverContent configuration that prevents clipping (portal usage, z-index, side/align, container overflow interactions) and (2) the Calendar onSelect handlers closing the corresponding popover after date selection.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the Master Designs page overlap issues so that opening the Karigar List and any action menus/lists does not overlap or collide with the page layout, including row-level Actions UI rendering above the table and not being clipped by parent containers.
missing_requirements.reason: The Karigar List dialog is adjusted to be viewport-bounded with internal scrolling, and the page header/actions layout is made more wrap-friendly. However, the table implementation shown contains only inline buttons (no menu/popover/dialog for row-level Actions), and there are no evidenced changes ensuring any row-level Actions menus/dialogs render above the table and are not clipped by parent containers.
